current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend the Intermodal Surface Transportation Efficiency Act of 1991 with respect to high priority
			 corridors on the National Highway System, and for other purposes.

committee-name.#text: Committee on Environment and Public Works

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Route to Opportunity And Development Act of 2014
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Route to Opportunity And Development Act of 2014

header.#text: High priority corridors on National Highway System

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
is
			 amended by
			 striking paragraph (13) and inserting the following:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Section 1105(c) of the Intermodal Surface Transportation Efficiency Act of 1991
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Intermodal Surface Transportation Efficiency Act of 1991/s:1105/ss:c

text.#text:
Raleigh-Norfolk Corridor from Raleigh, North Carolina, through Rocky Mount, Williamston, and
			 Elizabeth City, North Carolina, to Norfolk, Virginia.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
is amended in the first sentence by
			 inserting

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Section 1105(e)(5)(A) of the Intermodal Surface Transportation Efficiency Act of 1991
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Intermodal Surface Transportation Efficiency Act of 1991/s:1105/ss:e/p:5/sp:A

header.#text: Inclusion of certain route segments on interstate system

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 S2720 IS: Route to Opportunity And Development Act of 2014
